description: Nearest integer to 3n/4 unless that is an integer, when 3n/2.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,2,0,0,0,-1).
maple: A028390 := proc(n) if 3*n mod 4 = 0 then 3*n/2 else round(3*n/4); fi; end;
author: _J. H. Conway_
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 13 2001
